#summary Esignal use in TradeLink

=== Requirements ===

 * eSignal subscription
 * eSignal Pro installed
 * eSignal API entitlement purchased from eSignal (seperate esignal fees)

=== Steps ===

 # Start esignalserver connector from Start->TradeLink
 # enter your esignal entitlement login information
 # click login
 # start a tradelink client (eg quotopia,ASP, record)
 # it should automatically connect to the esignal connector
 # you should be able to get quotes

=== Notes ===

 * If you have all the requirements but still get a red login, ensure you are running as administrator
 * eSignal connector can only be used to get quotes, can't submit orders or do executions.
